```{r}
library(tidyverse)
organicBlocks=c("organic","conventional") 
treatment=c("Plastic","No Plastic") 
designMatrix = expand.grid(organicBlocks,treatment)

designMatrix %>% 
  group_by(Var1,Var2) %>% 
  expand(count =1:4) %>%
  mutate(survivalTIme = NA)




```
